panels.title: Number of Votes for Latest Checkpoint
Latest Checkpoint Candidate fetched from Midnight

panels.description:
Apdex given:
- satisfied count = sent + received - low - high
- tolerant count = low
- total count = sent + received
panels.title: apdex_network_healthy $node
Mined blocks (not all mined blocks end up included in the chain)

panels.description: mined blocks / total blocks in the chain * 100
panels.title: Mined blocks rate ($node)

panels.description: Time between latest imported block and its parent
panels.title: Latest block time

panels.description:
- Apdex RPC_responses = (SatisfiedCount + ToleratingCount / 2) / TotalSamples

SatisfiedCount = MethodsSuccessCounter
ToleratingCount = MethodsErrorCounter
TotalSamples = MethodsSuccessCounter + MethodsErrorCounter + MethodsExceptionCounter
panels.title: apdex_RPC responses
